attributes.action: Ask the Chinese government to stop killing dogs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: World animal organizations have published recent photos of stray dogs around Beijing being hunted down and bludgeoned to death in a clean up operation for the Olympic Games.  The Chinese report that they will kill up to 500,000 dogs.  These dogs are already starving as there is no animal aid in China and this cruelty should not be allowed in a country with trade connections  with the U.K.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
